name: Scrap (itch) (Dan Missato)
description:
Game made quickly for Ludum Dare 44 with the theme "Your life is currency".

Literally a scrap game in all respects. For the game scavengers out there. 

The robot has to find enough scrap to build it's progeny with at the end of it's lifetime. If it doesn't have enough scrap by then, the game ends. It's basically a slot machine. Quickly put together a simple background song to go with it.

No graphics, sorry!

Ludum Dare page

-- Fixed song not looping.
